argument.name: target
argument.description: A zero-based row number or string representing the value returned by the List. For example, if the List is configured to return values from a 'Lastname' column, target could be set to 'Smith' to get data for the record with a 'Lastname' of 'Smith'.

page.description: Returns a JSON object containing the data in the target row.
page.discussion: Gets a data object (a Javascript object) for the row specified by target. Once you have the data object, you can get the value of specific columns.
